'''Bountiful Core''' is a [[Summon]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]]. It appears in the opponent's Summons Zone when a [[Bloom]] reaction is triggered on a [[Character Card]] with the Golden Chalice's Bounty status. The Golden Chalice's Bounty status is gained after using [[Nilou (Character Card)|Nilou's]] [[Dance of Haftkarsvar (Character Card Skill)|Dance of Haftkarsvar]] in a party of Hydro Characters and Dendro Characters and characters from no other Elements.
